title: 3 and Out - AB All-TMZ, Rodgers vs. Media, SB to Jerry's World (?), Week 18 and Black Monday Preview, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - AB All-TMZ, Rodgers vs. Media, SB to Jerry's World (?), Week 18 and Black Monday Preview, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to Antonio Brown releasing private text messages with Bruce Arians on Twitter, the media dust up between Aaron Rodgers and a Chicago sportswriter, and if the NFL should move the Super Bowl to Jerry's World instead of heavily regulated L.A. He also previews the top week 18 games, looks ahead to which coaches will be gone when Black Monday rolls around, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
